title: A bill to expand and enhance postbaccalaureate opportunities at Hispanic-serving institutions, and for other purposes.
content: Next Generation Hispanic-Serving Institutions Act - Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to revise requirements for Hispanic-serving institutions (HSIs) under title V . Establishes a program of competitive grants to eligible HSIs that offer postbaccalaureate certifications or degrees . Limits a part B grant award's duration to not more than five years. Prohibits the Secretary of Education from awarding more than one part B grant to an HSI in any one fiscal year. Authorizes appropriations for: (1) the current part A program of grants to HSIs that offer baccalaureate degrees or are junior or community colleges. And (2) the new part B program of grants to HSIs that offer postbaccalaureate certifications or degrees.
